scripts.deploy-api:dev: npm run build-api:staging && firebase deploy --only functions:api --project dev
scripts.deploy-webapp:dev: npm run build-webapp:staging && firebase deploy --only functions:webapp --project dev
scripts.deploy-api:prod: npm run build-api:prod && firebase deploy --only functions:api --project prod
scripts.deploy-webapp:prod: npm run build-webapp:prod && firebase deploy --only functions:webapp --project prod
scripts.sync-web:dev: firebase --project dev functions:config:unset doppler && firebase functions:config:set doppler="$(doppler secrets download -p canitrundoom-webapp --config stg --no-file)"
scripts.sync-api:dev: firebase --project dev functions:config:unset doppler && firebase functions:config:set doppler="$(doppler secrets download -p canitrundoom-api --config stg --no-file)"
